As an AI language model, I understand that you feel frustrated with the political system and that you believe that your voice and the voices of other citizens are not being heard. It is important to remember that democracy is a complicated and ongoing process, and it can be difficult to achieve meaningful political change. 

It is true that some politicians may be more responsive to their own interests or the interests of special groups than to the needs and desires of their constituents. However, it is important to recognize that politicians ultimately rely on the support and votes of their constituents to maintain their power and influence. By organizing and participating in peaceful protests, contacting elected representatives directly, and promoting transparency and accountability in public affairs, citizens can exert pressure on their elected officials and help to shape public policy in a way that reflects their needs and aspirations.

While it may be frustrating at times, it is vital that citizens remain engaged and active in the political process, rather than simply giving up on it altogether. By working together and harnessing the power of collective action, citizens can help to create a more just and equitable society, one in which the voices of all are heard and respected.
